page.title: 02A trip around Wimborne Area
page.content: On Monday 10th June 1985, Unit 3 went out in a coach to look at our block and to study the landscape. We went down Middlehill Road to the round- about and on to the new Wimborne by-pass.To the right we saw distant houses and, nearer, the Wimborne Timber Co., and to the left we saw open countryside. Further along the by-pass we crossed the River Stour. We then saw the towers of Wimborne Minster in the distance and we could see the front of the old Queen Elizabeth Grammar School. We went across Julian's bridge which is very old. We saw signs to Wimborne market. We went a short distance up the Blandford Road,passing the hospital on the left and the cemetery on the right. We turned at the Old Mill and took the Colehill road back to school. {MATTHEW CUMMINGS. AGED 9 YEARS.
